name: Blanket Cat: A Short & Cozy Cat Simulator Visual Novel
name_original: Blanket Cat: A Short & Cozy Cat Simulator Visual Novel
description:
"Oh! Come in, Come in--
And let us begin,
There's no need to delay:
"How are you feeling today?"♥ The Kitchen Witch Creed, Verse 3 ♥

Blanket Cat  is a cozy visual novel about:

  • Iggy: A petulant black cat. 
  • Baba: A kindly kitchen witch.
  • Peep: A lost little mouse.
  • And their quest to have a great day!

Told in second person, you will directly experience the world as Iggy. Baba, your witch, is heading to the store, so that gives you plenty of time for... activities! 

Hunt, sleep, or explore in this short visual novel about found family, platonic love, and a pastoral life.

Our time together is short. Try not to worry about anything else.

Each Blanket Cat  playthrough will take  15-30 minutes to play.

This version of the game contains:

  • 7,000 words total
  • 2 Choices
  • 3 Unique Routes
  • 6 Different Endings

Please consider taking a brief 6 question post-playthrough survey!

Blanket Cat  was produced by Studio Ghost Legs and a talented team of freelance writers and artists:

  • notafish - Director / Lead Writer / Programmer / UI & Logo
  • Wudgeous - Writer for 'Sleep!'
  • Camille 'Coda' Weefur - Writer for 'Explore!'
  • Sasha Ines - Sprite and CG Artist
  • putriayua - Ending Sketch Artist
